Text: Task assignmentsGPGEOTT operations Cc is for the EOTT people who will be coming to this meeting to coordinate with GPG people on assignment of tasks for the outsourcing arrangements Rod Hayslett will notify the Enron participants

Operation and Services Agreementmore organized electronic version of the agreement Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample PM To Leadership Group cc Subject Operation and Services Agreement Attached is the Operation and Services Agreement in an electronic format If anyone needs this in hard copy with signed pages please call me Thanks Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax

Corporate Services Agreementis a draft of the Corporate Services Agreement to cover the property tax function EOTT is moving to Enron Could you please forward this to the appropriate Human Resources and Legal people I am not sure who would handle this Also if Rodney Meeks start date is something other than December the Exhibit B will need to be redone Thanks Please call if you have questions Mary Ellen Coombe is out this week but I can contact her if there are questions on the HR side Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax

Corporate Services Agreement Cc I please have an ETA on any comments to this agreement I will be out of town the first three days of next week and would like to have this done by Dec Thanks Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on PM Molly Sample PM To Gavin nron Rod nron cc Subject Corporate Services Agreement Attached is a draft of the Corporate Services Agreement to cover the property tax function EOTT is moving to Enron Could you please forward this to the appropriate Human Resources and Legal people I am not sure who would handle this Also if Rodney Meeks start date is something other than December the Exhibit B will need to be redone Thanks Please call if you have questions Mary Ellen Coombe is out this week but I can contact her if there are questions on the HR side Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Molly Sample General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax

Re FW Legal BillsProject TimberYes and I got a copy of the bill I have no idea how to divide it up It is not very clear on what company incurred which expenses Please call me and I can give you some thoughts on this Thanks Molly Sample VP General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Rod nronXgate PM To Molly ott cc Subject FW Legal BillsProject Timber Did you get this I have been out of the office Original Message From Horton Stanley Sent Wednesday July AM To Hayslett Rod Cc Uhl Jessica Subject RE Legal BillsProject Timber Rod is correct Everyone is covering their own expenses Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday July PM To Horton Stanley Subject FW Legal BillsProject Timber My recollection is that when we lowered the price that everyone was then going to cover their own bills Original Message From Sample Molly Sent Monday July PM To Uhl Jessica Cc Gibbs Dana Hayslett Rod Subject RE Legal BillsProject Timber We are putting together cost numbers over here When do you think you will have a resolution on this issue I will assume no charge to EOTT unless you tell me you have heard otherwise from Stan or Rod Thanks Molly Sample VP General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Jessica nronXgate AM To Molly ott Ann nronXgate cc Dana ott Subject RE Legal BillsProject Timber Molly and Ann I was under the impression that VE expenses related to EOTT would be paid by EOTT However I may have misunderstood Stans comments a few weeks ago and I dont know how feasible it is to split the expenses I believe this is a StanRodDana decision ultimately Jessica Original Message From Sample Molly Sent Monday July AM To Uhl Jessica Cc Gibbs Dana Subject RE Legal BillsProject Timber Just confirming Bobs comments that EOTT will NOT be receiving any VE bills on Project Timber Thanks Molly Sample VP General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax Forwarded by Molly SampleHoustonEott on AM Baird Bob AM To Molly ott cc Wells Carol Subject RE Legal BillsProject Timber OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap Molly I talked with Ann Ballard who said that all of VEs fees and expenses on Project Timber would be paid by Enron Corp And our billing coordinator Carol Wells plans to send the bills to Enron So the only legal fees that EOTT will have will be Haynes Boone plus any followup work that you ask us to do which I dont think will be much if anything Do you want an estimate anyway Original Message From mailto Sent Monday July AM To Subject Legal BillsProject Timber BobWe are pulling together costs for Project Timber When can we expect to see either an estimate or an invoice for time from VE Thanks Molly Sample VP General Counsel EOTT Energy Corp fax CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You
Your decisionwant to thank you for making the decisions that you announced today I believe you did the right thing I look forward to working with you and Dana Molly
